Dependency

  1. lmdb-mdb
  2. gflags
  3. glog
  4. leveldb
  5. snappy
  6. Altas (Hard to compile) /OpenBLAS
  7. ViennaCL
  8. libDNN
  9. OpenCL-ICD-Loader
  10. OpenCL & OpenCL Driver

https://github.com/viennacl/viennacl-dev

OpenCL-ICD-Loader

Itâ€™s a proxy to switch between different implementations of OpenCL in the device. The config file is located in /etc/OpenCl/vendors/XXXXX.icd
